root.name: The Legend of Makai
root.description: OverviewThe Legend of Makai is an action/adventure game developed and published by Jaleco for the arcade platform. In Japan, The Legend of Makai is known as Makai Densetsu.StoryThe princess of the Makai Wastelands has been kidnapped by an evil undead wizard. There is but a single spell that can defeat the evil wizard. The letters that make up the spell must be found scattered throughout the Makai Wastelands in order for the evil wizard to be defeated for good.
